## What Are Cookies?
Cookies are small text files stored on your device (computer, smartphone, tablet) when you visit a website. They help websites function effectively, enhance user experience, and provide analytics data to website owners.

Cookies can be:
- **Session Cookies**: Temporary cookies that expire when you close your browser.
- **Persistent Cookies**: Cookies that remain on your device until they expire or are deleted.

## Cookies We Use

These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. Without these, some parts of the website may not work as intended.

### Analytics Cookies
We use Google Analytics to collect information about how visitors use vrisk.io. This includes:

- Time spent on the site

Google Analytics helps us understand visitor behavior, allowing us to optimize our content and improve user experience. The data collected is anonymous and does not personally identify you.

You have control over how cookies are used on your device. You can:

**Please note**: Disabling certain cookies may affect your ability to use some features on our website.
